text: Dov Ben-Meir (, 11 August 1927 – 21 March 2020) was a Polish-born Israeli politician and trade unionist. He was a member of the Knesset for the Alignment between 1981 and 1988. Ben-Meir was born in Ciechocinek, Poland. Ben-Meir died on 21 March 2020 in Tel Aviv, Israel at the age of 92.דב בן-מאיר ז"ל ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Members of the Knesset Category:Hebrew University of Jerusalem alumni Category:Israeli trade unionists Category:Jewish Israeli politicians Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Polish Jews
title: Dov Ben-Meir
